name: Wizardry X: Zensen no Gakufu
synopsis: Wizardry X: Zensen no Gakufu is a spin-off of the popular ''Wizardry'' series and a prequel to [[Wizardry X 2: Mugen no Gakuto]]. Wizardry X is the first in the series of school RPGs produced by MichaelSoft. Includes the staple of the Wizardry series: randomly generated dungeons. Also included are monsters with tens of thousands of patterns, all with changing levels and attributes, as well as 600 new items and elements to discover.
